script.name: plugin.mini.game
script.description: Hacking Mini-Game for MD and SE scripts. (Main)
script.sourceplaintext:
* ************************************************ * SCRIPT NAME: plugin.mini.game * DESCRIPTION: Hacking-inspired mini-game. Could be used by plots or generic missions. * Requires plugin.mini.game.menu.loop. * * AUTHOR: DrBullwinkle DATE: 11 December 2012 * Cipher mini-game by jack775544 * ************************************************ * v17 (2013-05-12) * - Removed hotkey from setup file. (Use old setup file or modify the setup for testing). * - Added umlaut code to cipher mini-game (lines 146-151). * - Changed id's 3015 and 3016 to include diacritical characters for Decryption game (requires testing). * - Added id 4000 for Cipher mini-game (requires testing). * - Moved top bar for Find Password (matching numbers) game so that it is aligned with the numbers below (Terre). * - Added note to id 2001 to not translate the select value="OK" part of the text. * - Added language code to test for non-English games. Lines 154-157. * - Changed ID's 1, 2, 3, 53, 54,1001-1004, 2001, 3015, 3016, and 4000. * * v14 (2013-03-08) * - Cleaned up junk comments from previous versions. * * v13 (2013-03-02) * - Corrected broken t file. * - Moved alphabet for .lower.case to t file (for language translations). * * v12 (2013-02-26) * - Adds 2 DSD for "Win" and 1 DSD for "Lose" (again). * * v11 (-2013-02-26) * General: * - Moved remaining text to t file. * - Many clean-ups to menus and text for more unified appearance. * - Added info lines to several menus. * - Added Description field to all scripts. * - Added author to some incoming messages. Replaced messages with menus where appropriate. * * Find Password: * - Shortened title to fit. * - Added info description. * - Static failure and success messages. * * Decrypt phrase: * - Use custom menu (small) for better look. * - Removed two redundant incoming messages. * - Handle DSD when resuming after a pause. * - Fixed bug: If you submit your solution, but haven't entered anything, the hacking succeeds. * - Fixed bug: Pausing returns silently. * * Encryption (Cipher) * - Use custom menu (small) for better look. * - Shortened text to fit. * - Re-added info line 3. * * General notes: * + Please also add descriptions to the script files in their header. It makes identifying the purpose of the script way * easier, when browsing the script list in the SE. * * Questions: ("Why did we do it that way?") * - Answer1: Usually because of insufficient English documentation required to do it any other way. ;) * - Answer2: In one case, it was due to limitation of the menu commands (Title text display twice: apparently hardcoded). * * Future Ideas (Maybe) * ------------------------- * + Decryption: Display correct solution in the "You lose"-menu. (Requires architectural change. Maybe use MessageBox instead.) * * + Is it possible to call the hacking games seperately? (Yes, although the variety of games may be important for players with varied skills.) * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * Defaults $PageID = 8558 set global variable: name='mini.game.PageID' value=$PageID $Debug = get global variable: name='gv.bw.debug' * $Debug = 'ON' if $Debug == 'ON' write to log file #$PageID append=0 value=' - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - plugin.mini.game - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - ' end
* Constants. $c.play.find.password = read text: page=$PageID id=1 $c.play.decryption = read text: page=$PageID id=2 $c.play.cipher = read text: page=$PageID id=3 $c.play.find.password = string $c.play.find.password to integer $c.play.decryption = string $c.play.decryption to integer $c.play.cipher = string $c.play.cipher to integer $c.color.none = read text: page=$PageID id=33 $c.color.cyan = read text: page=$PageID id=34 $c.color.red = read text: page=$PageID id=35 $c.color.yellow = read text: page=$PageID id=36 $c.color.green = read text: page=$PageID id=37 $c.color.white = read text: page=$PageID id=38 $c.color.blue = read text: page=$PageID id=39 $c.color.magenta = read text: page=$PageID id=32 $c.menu.ok = read text: page=$PageID id=2003 $c.menu.ok = $c.color.green + $c.menu.ok + $c.color.none $c.cancel.text = read text: page=$PageID id=2004 $c.cancel.text = $c.color.red + $c.cancel.text + $c.color.none $c.menu.restart = read text: page=$PageID id=2005 $c.menu.restart = $c.color.green + $c.menu.restart + $c.color.none $c.text.success = read text: page=$PageID id=2006 $c.chance.find.password = read text: page=$PageID id=53 $c.chance.find.password = string $c.chance.find.password to integer $c.chance.cipher = read text: page=$PageID id=54 $c.chance.cipher = string $c.chance.cipher to integer $c.text.subtitle.start.game = read text: page=$PageID id=56 $c.text.yes = read text: page=$PageID id=2015 $c.text.yes.green = $c.color.green + $c.text.yes + $c.color.none $c.text.no = read text: page=$PageID id=2016 $c.text.no.red = $c.color.red + $c.text.no + $c.color.none $c.text.hacking.mini.game = read text: page=$PageID id=2017 $c.text.hacking.mini.game = $c.color.white + $c.text.hacking.mini.game + $c.color.none $c.text.try.again = read text: page=$PageID id=2018 $c.text.do.you.want.to.try.again = read text: page=$PageID id=2019 $c.menu.cancel = -1 $c.menu.cancel.all = -2 $c.menu.no.select = 0 $c.sound.clock.tick = 982 $c.sound.electric.beep = 924 $c.sound.radar.beep = 972 $c.sound.electric.fizzle = 971 $c.sound.menu.two.tone = 968 $c.sound.cargo.eject = 964 $c.sound.docking.bay.arms.extended = 963 $c.sound.electric.arcing = 962 $c.sound.menu.ok = 955 $c.sound.klaxon = 925 $c.sound.buzzer = 929 $c.sound.tri.tone.beep = 1124 $c.sound.check.click = 1119 $c.sound.dtmf.error = 1118 $c.sound.bloop.bloop.bleep = 1114 $c.sound.promotion.alert = 1100 $c.sound.detector = 986 $c.sound.clocktick = 982 $c.sound.sonar = 1008 $c.sound.radar = 972 $won = -1 * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* Acknowledge the key press before starting. play sample $c.sound.clocktick
ReStart: * Clear MD message markers before playing game? $dsds = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Data Storage Device in cargo bay $dsds = 0 - $dsds = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add $dsds units of Data Storage Device
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - if $Debug == 'ON' $dsds = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Data Storage Device in cargo bay write to log file #$PageID append=1 printf: fmt='Main.cleared: DSDs=%s', $dsds, null, null, null, null end * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* Choose the game to play. $rnd = random value from 1 to 102 - 1 $rnd = $rnd - 1 if $rnd <= $c.chance.find.password AND $c.play.find.password * Find Password (match binary numbers) @ $won = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.find.password : else if $rnd <= $c.chance.cipher AND $c.play.cipher * Cipher Game @ $won = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.cipher : else if $c.play.decryption * Decryption (anagrams) @ $won = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.decrypt : else * Default is Find Password (number only). @ $won = null -> call script plugin.mini.game.find.password : end
* Handle the return. if $won == 1 * Success play sample $c.sound.check.click = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 2 units of Data Storage Device * else if $won == 0 else if $won == -2 * Pause else * Fail play sample $c.sound.buzzer = [PLAYERSHIP] -> add 1 units of Data Storage Device $won = -1 * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - return $won * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - * MessageBox $title = $c.text.hacking.mini.game $description = null $question = $c.text.do.you.want.to.try.again $heading = $c.text.try.again $choice1 = $c.text.yes.green $choice2 = $c.text.no.red $wide = [FALSE]
* Array of Options: Title, Description, Question, Heading, Choice1, Choice2, Wide (T/F) $a.options = array alloc: size=0 append $title to array $a.options append $description to array $a.options append $question to array $a.options append $heading to array $a.options append $choice1 to array $a.options append $choice2 to array $a.options append $wide to array $a.options
@ $retval = [THIS] -> call script plugin.mini.game.messagebox : Array of Options: Title, Description, Question, Heading, Choice1, Choice2, Wide (T/F)=$a.options * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - if $retval goto label ReStart end end
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - if $Debug == 'ON' $dsds = [PLAYERSHIP] -> get amount of ware Data Storage Device in cargo bay write to log file #$PageID append=1 printf: fmt='Main.end: DSDs=%s', $dsds, null, null, null, null end * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
* Do we need to have time to play the sounds? @ = wait 500 ms
* - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - return $won * - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

comment.var: DESCRIPTION: Hacking-inspired mini-game. Could be used by plots or generic missions.
- Removed hotkey from setup file. (Use old setup file or modify the setup for testing).
- Added umlaut code to cipher mini-game (lines 146-151).
- Changed id's 3015 and 3016 to include diacritical characters for Decryption game (requires testing).
- Added id 4000 for Cipher mini-game (requires testing).
- Moved top bar for Find Password (matching numbers) game so that it is aligned with the numbers below (Terre).
- Added note to id 2001 to not translate the select value="OK" part of the text.
- Added language code to test for non-English games. Lines 154-157.
- Cleaned up junk comments from previous versions.
- Moved alphabet for .lower.case to t file (for language translations).
- Adds 2 DSD for "Win" and 1 DSD for "Lose" (again).
- Moved remaining text to t file.
- Many clean-ups to menus and text for more unified appearance.
- Added info lines to several menus.
- Added Description field to all scripts.
- Added author to some incoming messages. Replaced messages with menus where appropriate.
- Use custom menu (small) for better look.
- Handle DSD when resuming after a pause.
- Fixed bug: If you submit your solution, but haven't entered anything, the hacking succeeds.
- Use custom menu (small) for better look.
+ Please also add descriptions to the script files in their header. It makes identifying the purpose of the script way
easier, when browsing the script list in the SE.
Questions: ("Why did we do it that way?")
- Answer1: Usually because of insufficient English documentation required to do it any other way. ;)
- Answer2: In one case, it was due to limitation of the menu commands (Title text display twice: apparently hardcoded).
+ Decryption: Display correct solution in the "You lose"-menu. (Requires architectural change. Maybe use MessageBox instead.)
+ Is it possible to call the hacking games seperately? (Yes, although the variety of games may be important for players with varied skills.)
Acknowledge the key press before starting.
Clear MD message markers before playing game?
Array of Options: Title, Description, Question, Heading, Choice1, Choice2, Wide (T/F)

line.text: Array of Options: Title, Description, Question, Heading, Choice1, Choice2, Wide (T/F)=

comment.var: Do we need to have time to play the sounds?

sval.val: Hacking Mini-Game for MD and SE scripts. (Main)
DESCRIPTION: Hacking-inspired mini-game. Could be used by plots or generic missions.
- Removed hotkey from setup file. (Use old setup file or modify the setup for testing).
- Added umlaut code to cipher mini-game (lines 146-151).
- Changed id's 3015 and 3016 to include diacritical characters for Decryption game (requires testing).
- Added id 4000 for Cipher mini-game (requires testing).
- Moved top bar for Find Password (matching numbers) game so that it is aligned with the numbers below (Terre).
- Added note to id 2001 to not translate the select value="OK" part of the text.
- Added language code to test for non-English games. Lines 154-157.
- Cleaned up junk comments from previous versions.
- Moved alphabet for .lower.case to t file (for language translations).
- Adds 2 DSD for "Win" and 1 DSD for "Lose" (again).
- Moved remaining text to t file.
- Many clean-ups to menus and text for more unified appearance.
- Added info lines to several menus.
- Added Description field to all scripts.
- Added author to some incoming messages. Replaced messages with menus where appropriate.
- Use custom menu (small) for better look.
- Handle DSD when resuming after a pause.
- Fixed bug: If you submit your solution, but haven't entered anything, the hacking succeeds.
- Use custom menu (small) for better look.
+ Please also add descriptions to the script files in their header. It makes identifying the purpose of the script way
easier, when browsing the script list in the SE.
Questions: ("Why did we do it that way?")
- Answer1: Usually because of insufficient English documentation required to do it any other way. ;)
- Answer2: In one case, it was due to limitation of the menu commands (Title text display twice: apparently hardcoded).
+ Decryption: Display correct solution in the "You lose"-menu. (Requires architectural change. Maybe use MessageBox instead.)
+ Is it possible to call the hacking games seperately? (Yes, although the variety of games may be important for players with varied skills.)
Acknowledge the key press before starting.
Clear MD message markers before playing game?
Array of Options: Title, Description, Question, Heading, Choice1, Choice2, Wide (T/F)
Do we need to have time to play the sounds?
